text: How do you turn on HubSpot Video captions by default? I can’t find anything on the subject in the documentation or in the dev forums

How interesting, I'm not sure what I was working with way back when I was messing with this. Few 1000 slack messages ago... :slightly_smiling_face:

Not to worry, chatGPT saved the day in the end!
will an `hs-content-id-xxxxxxxxxxx` stay the same between content staging and production?

<@U01P7C5P866> I just see this now im sorry for keeping you waiting for 3 months but unfotunately no, I checked with HubSpot but it loading only value of dropdown and select properties is normal behavior, although they did also say that it was a bit weird and that they’d bring it up internally to see if something can change there. that said ive done the following: i made a workflow that copies the name of the selected dropdown to a text field property which i then show on the page. that worked well
Why do I always get the value "0" for post_counts in this snippet?
Is it possible to get an updated value within a for loop?
